attributes.action: Investigate the bond with the FIA and Ferrari.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is required as the sport is now at its lowest for years in the eyes of fans all around the world. I would like you the investigate the unusual bond between Ferrari and the FIA, also find out why other teams have harder punishments, but Ferrari get off lightly.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
